```{r Load libraries, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)  

```

```{r Data Import}
input_dir <- sprintf("%s/input", getwd())
input_dir

for(file in list.files(input_dir)){
  name <- substring(file, 1, 1)
  df   <- readxl::read_excel(sprintf("%s/%s", input_dir, file))
  assign(name, df)
  rm(file, name, df)
}
```

